2164.subject: HCOM
2164.descrlong:
A multimedia lab in digital humanities Focus on digitizing, editing and creatng images, audio, and video; online media research and copyright fair use. Recommended for students enrolled in HCOM courses employing digital humanities methods and practices and for students unfamiliar with I-Movie, Photoshop, sound editing, and online media research. 

(Coreq: HCOM 328)
